issue.title: youtube buttons not showing on video when paused
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.9.23

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=uqOOOR7Kr-s

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

with adguard base enabled:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/0381f4fa-7c1e-4aa1-8c3a-dcb05df0c2f0)


Without Adguard base enabled:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/1889a450-ec8b-475b-b962-4dc33865b09b)

### Privacy

issue.title: mangalib.ru

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://mangalib.ru](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmangalib.ru) ### Comment > В приложении не блокируется реклама, хотя некоторое время назад её не было. К сожалению нет возможности с телефона указать на рекламу внутри приложения Username: `@AkioKoneko` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/3bnp2t5c8hc04sgkc8cock8coc4gssw4s5jgjuh9zi.jpg?nc=1)

comment.body:
> [@AkioKoneko](https://github.com/AkioKoneko) А можете попользоваться с правилом `://yandex.ru/appcry|` без ограничения приложением? Интересно, как яндексные приложения будут себя вести.

Я то могу, но не думаю, что много статистики соберу. Т.к. живу там, где сервисов яндекс нету, и ничем от них сейчас не пользуюсь на телефоне :c 
Но если решу рабочую почту на яндексе или еще что-то установить, то добавлю правило и протестирую

issue.title: github.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/199158](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2FAdguardTeam%2FAdguardFilters%2Fissues%2F199158) ### Comment > Just trying to report that after opening the ticket https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/199158#event-16459976555 it then started to work fine a couple days later (so the ticket can be closed), just couldn't comment in the original ticket itself. > Thank you for your hard work :) Username: `@Drakull` ### Screenshots
